Description: Like Magdon Music on Facebook! For your review and consideration- we present you with another fine Dave Mustaine Guitar from the guitar collection at Magdon Music! Please read the description below and review the photos. The exact guitar pictured and in the description is the exact guitar that you will be bidding on. If there is something that you need to know that is not in this description- please contact us at Magdon Music before bidding and we will be very happy to assist! *** Please note that our guitars are tech inspected before they go out the door! Buy with confidence from Magdon Music! ***Free/Flat rate shipping is for the Continental USA (lower 48 only!) If you live outside of this area- please contact us for your ship rate. Pictured here we have a great deal on a Dave Mustaine Signature Zero "Angel of Deth II" Electric Guitar. Comes with the leather-like bag shown. Plays great and weighs in at approx 6lbs & 15oz. Original owner bought new and hardly played this. Very little playwear- maybe a small insignificant ding on back and a random light surface scratch or two if you really look- but just looks fantastic. Fun Fun guitar. Ready to rock! Graphics are awesome. Check it out! ***Free shipping is for USA ONLY! (Lower 48 only!) (SC18M80.SO) davemust If there is anything else that you need to know about this guitar or if you would like an in-hand description or more photos- please feel free to give a jingle to our professional guitar department at Magdon Music. 1 8 8 8 Magdon 1 - we will be very happy to assist you! ***Please note that Magdon Music has showrooms full of guitars- both new and used. Title: Dean Dave Mustaine Signature Zero Electric Guitar with Gig Bag Angel of Deth II
